section.heading: Reporting requirements.
section.text: The Department of Energy and Environment shall submit an annual report to the Mayor and the Council on the program required by § 8-1772.32, which shall include detailed information on recruitment initiatives and the creation of contracting opportunities.
section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 22-257: § 601 of D.C. Law 22-257 provided that the creation of this section by § 403 of D.C. Law 22-257 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
